list.name: Changes
list.comment:
- Added: 1. annotations of access control limits in AssortmentController.java & UserController.java 2. access control fixes in homepage.html , indexView.html, show.html - Changed: 1. Correcting the view in the files: show.html, editProduct.html, addProduct.html, homepage.html, indexView.html, show.html
- Small fixes -

task.summary: Default task
firt real commit: Added: 1. Project structure 2. Dependencies 3. POJO-classes for tables 'user' & 'address'
firt real commit: Added: 1. Project structure 2. Dependencies 3. POJO-classes for tables 'user' & 'address'

second real commit: Added: 1. Lombok anotations 2. Connection to DB Fixed: 1. .gitignore file 2. enum of roles on site (renamed and moved) 3. Class "Client" renamed in "User" Deleted: 1. Plugin trash file
Added: 1. 8 pages of html. 2. page controller 3. Product POJO Fixed: 1. small pom.xml fixes, 2. small fixes User/Address POJO
Saving changes before switching to repositories: Added header & footer
work progress commit
work progress commit
added .gitignore

- Added: 1. Mechanism for adding categories: 1.1 Category entity, repository, service 1.2 HTML files of category addition pages 1.3 Get/post methods in AssortmentController. 2. Mechanism for displaying products from the DB. - Fixed (Changed): 1. data type Id -> long; 2. Entities -> ...Entities 3. other minor changes - Deleted: 1. unnecessary files (used earlier for training)
Added: 1. ProductDTO; 2. pager.html (display only, no functionality) 3. Pagination (dividing the resulting product list) Fixed: small modifications
Added: 1. functionality of pagination

Added: - Blocks of views: 1.1. categoryFilter.html 1.2. indexView.html 2. Page of products filtered by category (indexCategory.html) 3. new methods by filtration by category in ProductRepository & ProductService 4. Counting the number of page method
- Fixed: 1. Split controllers Assortment & Category
- Changed: 1. method index in AssortmentController.java (for filtering by category. it works if you pass the "categoryId" parameter manually. it doesn't display the whole list - it needs to be finished)
Added: Functional of Category filter
Small view fixes
Added ProductPageDTO.java for to analyze the approach
- Added: 1. Functional of product changing: 1.1. update method in ProductRepository 1.2. new logic of update method in ProductService - Fixed: 1. Bugs in products adding & changing

- Added: 1. pom.xml dependencies for using MapStruct 2. CategoryMapper & ProductMapper for using MapStruct
- Changed: 1. ProductDTO: Class field Long categoryId -> CategoryEntity category. 2. ProductService: Corrections with using MapStruct. 3. CategoryController: Corrections with using MapStruct. 4. AssortmentController: Corrections with using MapStruct.
- Small fixes

- Added : 1. UserDTO, CategoryDTO 2. UserMapper 3. All user page all.html 4. User show page showUser.html 5. Links to registration & log-in pages in header.html 6. Link to all user page in homepage.html 7. Logic of registration 8. Logic of updating users information (not full)
- Small Fixes -

- Added : 1. Logic of updating users information (full)
- Small Fixes -
- Added : 1. View for logic of updating users information
- Fixed: 1. Pagination methods in ProductService now process ProductDTO objects.

- Added: 1. Pagination in All users view
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. E-mail validation on registration page 2. User search by email
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. Functional of product searching (not correct, but work) - will be corrected
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. WebSecurityConfig & MyUserDetailsService for authorization
- Changed: 1. pom.xml dependencies 2. logins endpoints moved to LoginController.java 3. view of header.html (Anonymous user or not) 4. annotations of access control restrictions in CategoryController
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. WebSecurityConfig & MyUserDetailsService for authorization
- Changed: 1. pom.xml dependencies 2. logins endpoints moved to LoginController.java 3. view of header.html (Anonymous user or not) 4. annotations of access control restrictions in CategoryController
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. annotations of access control limits in AssortmentController.java & UserController.java 2. access control fixes in homepage.html , indexView.html, show.html - Changed: 1. Correcting the view in the files: show.html, editProduct.html, addProduct.html, homepage.html, indexView.html, show.html
- Small fixes -
